description: React component for managing courses in an educational content management system, including listing, creating, editing, and deleting courses.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of courses from the backend service and updates the state.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Handles input changes in the form fields.

methods.name: resetForm
methods.description: Resets the course form to initial empty values.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission for creating or updating a course.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Populates the form with selected course data for editing.
